Reviews.Title: great quality pictures for a fair amount of money.
Reviews.Author: Julio F
Reviews.Content: A good looking camera. Perfect for casual users who wants to carry a pocket sized digital camera for daily use.Menus are intuitive and easy to access.

Reviews.Title: Good Product for price
Reviews.Author: Ian Chung
Reviews.Content: Really good camera, functions really well and produces crystal clear pictures. Could be excellent with a better battery, battery depletes after about 200 snaps.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Francisyfl
Reviews.Content: This camera is actually pretty good, i thought i was gonna get a really crappy image quality but the pictures actually good pretty neat  ... just dont push the ISO too far. Also its really cool that it shoots video at 720p, the quality of the video is not out of this world tho, the video image looks kind of dull ... its not amazing, but it works. Hm, buy it if you are looking for a fast and cheap solution (althought as i said - the photos look pretty good)

Reviews.Title: My New Samsung ES91 digital camera
Reviews.Author: nessa2fine
Reviews.Content: I bought a samsung es91 from dbroth and it was delivered before the expected date. It is available in red, indigo, black and silver. I just got it so i haven't done much on it but i have taken a few test shot and they came out crystal clear. It is user friendly and perfect for me. The camera takes awesome photo and it is very small so it won't take up much space in your purse or your pocket. I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good looking modern camera.
Reviews.Author: Mangog
Reviews.Content: I have not had much opportunity to use my Samsung ES91 yet unfortunately. The few photos I have taken were crystal clear and downloaded quickly and easily to my PC. I know it can take hi def recording but I need a larger memory card, they always give you just a few megabytes. Overall I am very pleased with the camera especially for the price. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very slow and tends to blur images
Reviews.Author: M. Finn
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Christmas 2013. At first loved the price and quality seemed ok. However after repeated indoor use I found photos taken without the flash came out blurred half the time, and when using the flash it took about 20 seconds(which seems like a life time when trying to take a picture) for the camera to refocus for the next shot. Outside without the flash it works fine for a $50 camera...not a $90 one. There are better deals out there.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Busy Mom
Reviews.Content: We got three different brands of camerasfor our kids at Xmas.  All about thesame price.  This one was by far the bestperformer for the money.

Reviews.Title: Color is bad!
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Don't buy it for the price!!!!! it's cheap but the color it photoed is really bad and muddy.....i hope i can buy a better one.....

Reviews.Title: samsung es91 camera
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: Good quality video recording with sounds.  Almost every shot at a little bit of low lighting and night were blurry, even after trying out the different settings.  good if you need only daytime pictures and a lot of video recording. Overall, camera was good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: K. Dixon
Reviews.Content: This small, lightweight camera was the perfect fit for my mother-in-law. She wanted something that could take quick "decent" photos and an occasional video without costing an arm and a leg. This camera was the perfect fit.

Reviews.Title: Works great, nice color, good video.
Reviews.Author: Schultzica
Reviews.Content: Works great, nice color, good video. Long battery life, good clarity in the photos. The video is brilliant. I got this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift and he really likes it. Good point and shoot for the novice photo taker.

Reviews.Title: samsung digital camera
Reviews.Author: Rice
Reviews.Content: this camera was bought as a gift and after christmas morning when the person opend it and tried it out they fell in love with samsung and i could not stop getting thanks a million for this awesome gift

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Iris Belaire
Reviews.Content: Was very happy on how quick I received this product! And it has all the features of a Samsung at a great price! Wonderful camera for a mom! Someone who just wants to take great pictures and load them on the computer!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: transsformerss
Reviews.Content: it's realitivaly simple to learn and looks great!! you can pick the pixel resolution!! up to a nice 14mp. it's a camera and great camcorder too!!a good alternative to the $90 16mp versioncause at 14mp, you realy need a cats eye to tell the differensehope this review helps

Reviews.Title: Good quality photos for a Point and Shoot!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Caldwell
Reviews.Content: I use the product for taking quick digital photos for work projects. Once you get used to the screen menus, it is easy to adjust settings. My only issue is that the internal software crashed on me and I have to download te photos to my editing software.

Reviews.Title: hola
Reviews.Author: enigma120
Reviews.Content: este producto resulto ser bueno, la unica critica que pudiera tener es que le falto la memoria micro SD, Que el vendedor no mando con la camara...

Reviews.Title: Not sure how I feel about it...
Reviews.Author: RubiG
Reviews.Content: Takes VERY blurry pictures most of the time. I bought it so I could take frame worthy pictures but I'm not sure how much I like the results.

Reviews.Title: Bueno
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: Me llego a tiempo y en el tiempo predeterminado que se habia esperado en llegar, muy bueno no me quejo de nada

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Theresa A. Williams "Traysza"
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a cheap, no frills camera, I guess this will do.  The focus is very slow, and doesn't actually work half the time.  If you're trying to photograph sports or babies, get another camera.  There is so much delay that your shot's already moved on by the time it snaps the picture.  The automatic settings are pretty ineffective as well.

ProductInfo.Features:
5X Optical Zoom Lens
720p HD Movie Recording
2.7 Intelligent LCD provides improved contrast and colour reproduction
14 Megapixels
Left your spare battery at home? Recharge anywhere with USB Charging.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ES91 Digital Camera - 14 MP - 5x Zoom - Red
